attributes.action: ensure people in retirement are not penalised by the annual increases of Community Charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasingly many people who have retired are unable to meet the annual increases of community charges and are obliged to sell their properties in order to avoid imprisonment. Provision should be made for those who have fixed pensions, or none at all, to have a reasonable charge calculated on their ability to pay. The present method of overall charging is unjust.  Pensioners are obliged to pay the similar charge as those who are receiving income through employmentor other means.
